name: Nolan Salix
blurb: Salix has a professional history developed from joining the Marine Corp then working on light construction projects. He taught art classes at different Universities from 2001 to 2019.  He has a drive for developing conservational careers and living a life that reduces needed resources. He lives with his family in an Earthship that he and his family have built. He loves spending time in his garden, greenhouse, hunting and fishing.
